name: Green Guy Goes Grappling 2
storyline: Green Guy goes out to fight Red Guy but gets a little lost along the way.
summary: Green Guy Goes Grappling 2 is a super fast-paced platformer with a grappling hook released for desktop on June 7th, 2023.
